resources.string: Download files directly into the FileFly folder on the SD Card for them to be available.
Go to Settings to turn on NFC. Check under Wireless & Network Settings.
This app requires NFC to use.

This app requires files to be placed in the FileFly folder on the SD Card to be able to send them. Received files can be found in the FileFly/received folder on the SD Card. To send a file, enter your first and last name, click "Choose File", select from the list of available files, and then click "Send" before touching smartphones together. To receive a file, open the "Beam Complete" notification and select FileFly from the menu.

This application and its source code are licensed under the Apache License v2 and contains other projects under the same license. The Apache Commons IO library version 2.4 is used in this software. The source code and license are available for download online at http://github.com/askii99/FileFly. Copyright 2014 Jacob Abramson, Andy Kakkaramadam, Peter Piech, and Saurabh Sharma.
